description: This file defines a function 'Create' that wraps the instantiation of a logging object from an external module, ProxyStubGenerator.Log, and adjusts the system path to include parent directories.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Log object from the external module, with optional verbosity and warning parameters.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
